alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 1:41PM PST until December 01 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph, creating hazardous blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Thursday to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from noon Friday through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...For the Winter Weather Advisory, travel could be difficult. For the Winter Storm Watch, travel could be difficult to impossible. Gusty winds during the Winter Storm Watch could create blowing snow reducing visibilities. It could also bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snowfall in higher terrain is possible through Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
